column4: Evening everyone. I've purchased a 3com 3c940 LAN card. There are two more netcards in my PC. THe problem is that the 3com card becames eth2 (the last one) instead of eth0. Is there any way I can force that card to be eth0, not eth2?
like...send a message to a tty?
or as in send a command to a screen?
